alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 10:30AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Hinds and Warren Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Yazoo and Madison Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Several thousand acres of agricultural and lowland become inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet tomorrow morning and begin a slow fall. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Big Black River West 15.0 17.4 Sat 9 am CST 17.9 17.5 17.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening.
